results.overview: Medium Sylvia Pickel and psychometrist Nick Deezy meet at a psychic research facility in New York. Not long after, they're contacted by Harry Buscafusco, who offers them $50,000 to find his lost son in South America, in the heart of Incan territory where they discover an ancient mystical secret, and each other.
results.title: Vibes

results.overview: A good song can make your world full of colour!
results.title: Vibes

results.overview: Mayssa is looking for a sexual release to cure her recent depression but luck – and her mother – are not on her side.
results.title: Vibes

results.overview: Join the Bratz as Yasmin, Cloe, Sasha and Jade come together to help others in these sweet, charmed adventures! From lending a sympathetic ear, pitching in to help their school, or doing good deeds for those in need, the Bratz discover that everyone can always use a helping hand! Get ready for some good vibes and good times in these featured episodes – “Bratz vs. Brats,” “Inner Beauty Queens,” “The Chronicles of Karma,” and “A Sporting Chance.”
results.title: Bratz: Good Vibes

results.overview: Two guys see each other from a distance; in a restaurant and they hesitate to open conversation with each other, because they have never met each other nor have they ever seen each other in their whole life or merely because culturally, ethically or rationally we don’t go and open random conversations with strangers; merely fearing a negative reciprocation.
results.title: The Vibes

results.overview: Difficult customer Karen gets more than she bargained for when she orders an intimate object from a company called Heavenly Heathens Adult Toys. Emphasis on the Heathens. Now Karen has a bone to pick with Heavenly Heathen’s top Customer Service Representative, Dana.
results.title: Bad Vibes

results.overview: Electrical appliances tend to have a lot of built up anger towards their users.
results.title: Bad Vibes

results.overview: Big cities. Street culture. Fashion. Welcome to the Urban Revolution.
results.title: Urban Vibes

results.overview: In an unconventional and upbeat form, “Broken Vibes” takes us off to the heart of the Broken Beat universe, a musical mixture born at the end of the last century brewing and drawing influences from the wide spectrum of Black Music : Jazz, Hip-Hop, Soul, Drum&Bass...  Reaching further the mere documentary on a musical genre, “Broken Vibes” aims at exploring the social, cultural and economical aspects of a movement, once local and now international, that grew amid a collective of talented and dedicated young people stemming from “West London”, a neighbourhood which had previously witnessed the birth of Punk, Acid Jazz, Jungle music…and of the sound systems culture nowadays embodied by the infamous Notting Hill Carnival.
results.title: Broken Vibes

results.overview: Documentary covering 24 hours in the life of Bristol, particularly focusing on the range of musical variety driven by its Afro-Caribbean inhabitants.
results.title: Bristol Vibes

results.overview: A young women attends a mysterious Job Interview intertwines with a VHS tape of an 80s Popstar.
results.title: Strange Vibes

results.overview: Lakshya is goalless, Jo is worried, parents are whiny and a big house is in total chaos. Will they be able to find a way through it ? Watch these crazy energies fuse together, trying to bring in 'The Good Vibes'.
results.title: The Good Vibes

results.original_title: Good Vibes at the Iowa State Fair
results.overview: An odyssey into America's heartland and its great political process. Three cut-ups from cult-hit podcast Chapo Trap House take a sideways look at the Iowa State Fair and the primary candidates appearing there, and come out feeling great.
results.title: Good Vibes at the Iowa State Fair

results.original_title: Holiday Vibes, Gigi De Lana with Gigi Vibes: YouTube Music Night Concert
results.overview: Holiday Vibes, Gigi De Lana with Gigi Vibes: YouTube Music Night Concert
results.title: Holiday Vibes, Gigi De Lana with Gigi Vibes: YouTube Music Night Concert

results.original_title: Red Beans And Rice Vol. 2: "Audio Vibes"
results.overview: Red Beans And Rice Vol. 2: Audio Vibes spins up another cool set of spine-tingling tales from the world of the record collector.
results.title: Red Beans And Rice Vol. 2: "Audio Vibes"

results.original_title: Lionel Hampton: Jazz Legend: King of the Vibes
results.overview: Jazz drummer Lionel Hampton ruled the stage with his sticks, swinging them wildly but with intent and talent. Discover Hampton's legacy, which began at the Holy Rosary Academy, where he learned how to lay down a drum line at the behest of the nuns who ran the school. Performing with the likes of Louis Armstrong and Chick Corea, Hampton was propelled by genius to the top of his game, one in which he introduced a new instrument, the vibraphone.
results.title: Lionel Hampton: Jazz Legend: King of the Vibes
